meanings.definition: A type of cancer that originates in the epithelial tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with epitheliomata after the biopsy.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating epitheliomata cases.
meanings.sent3: Despite its name, epitheliomata doesn't mean the cancer is made of skin cells!
meanings.sent4: The spread of epitheliomata in the body can be compared to a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: Learning about epitheliomata made me appreciate the complexity of cancer.

meanings.sent1: The lab results showed multiple epitheliomata in the tissue samples.
meanings.sent2: The research study focused on analyzing various epitheliomata found in the patients.
meanings.sent3: The collection of epitheliomata specimens looked like a tiny forest under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the field of pathology, identifying different types of epitheliomata is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had detailed illustrations of various epitheliomata for study purposes.
